name: Velociraptor
description: The Velociraptor is a small but agile beast known for its quickness and deadly coordination in packs, characterized by its sharp claws and beak.
memorable: The Velociraptor uses Pack Tactics to enhance its attacks, making it a cunning opponent when in groups.
goals: Hunt effectively in packs, restrain prey, and evade attacks.
relations: Often found hunting alongside other predators.
environment: Typically found in dense forests or open plains.
strengths: Exceptional Dexterity allows it to evade attacks and land hits easily, especially when working with allies.
weaknesses: Low Strength and Intelligence scores make it less effective in direct combat and strategic planning.
attacks: Utilizes a combination of claw and bite attacks, able to grapple and restrain opponents.
most_powerful_ability: Pack Tactics grants advantage on attack rolls against creatures threatened by its allies.
senses: It has a high Stealth score of 14, allowing it to remain hidden effectively.
skills: Good at staying stealthy and has decent perception.
additional_information: Critical hits against it are treated as normal hits due to its Hardy ability.
Can grapple and restrain creatures, effectively controlling the battlefield.
Capable of dealing substantial damage through its Maul action while grappling.
Works better in groups due to its Pack Tactics ability.
test_queries: predator that works well in groups
